Package io.servicetalk.serializer.utils

Class FixedLengthStreamingSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.serializer.utils.FixedLengthStreamingSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object to serialize.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamingDeserializer<T>, StreamingSerializer<T>, StreamingSerializerDeserializer<T>
    public final class FixedLengthStreamingSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StreamingSerializerDeserializer<T>
    A StreamingSerializerDeserializer that uses a SerializerDeserializer and frames each object by preceding it with the length in bytes. The length component is fixed and always consumes 4 bytes.

        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        serializer - The SerializerDeserializer used to serialize/deserialize individual objects.
        bytesEstimator - Provides the length in bytes for each FixedLengthStreamingSerializer being serialized.
